snippet: MENDELOW--Steven. Our hearts ache today over the sudden death of our friend and partner, Steven Mendelow. It is with a heavy heart that we share these thoughts with you. For over thirty years, our business and personal lives entwined together. It was the imagination and creativity of Steve's mind that was instrumental in building our successful business. Steve was a phone person, always reachable, always inviting his friends and clients to call him anywhere, anytime. He prided himself as being a financial doctor. We will forever miss his friendship, wisdom and sense of humor. Our condolences to his wife Nancy, daughters Pam and Cara and all his grandchildren. Bonnie & Robert Konigsberg Judy & Paul Konigsberg 1/3
